body.name: iHave Toothbrush Holders for Bathrooms, 2 Cups Toothbrush Holder Wall Mounted with Toothpaste Dispenser - Large Capacity Tray, Cosmetic Drawer - Tooth Brushing Holder & Bathroom Accessories
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 22 hrs 1 min
features: Large Capacity: The toothbrush holders for bathrooms have super storage capacity (1 tray, 1 storage compartment, and 1 drawer), not only can store combs, toothbrushes, toothpaste, soap, razors, etc., You can also put commonly used cosmetics and accessories in this bathroom decor to keep it clean and tidy.

Multifunction: This multi-function toothbrush holder comes with a automatic toothpaste dispenser, making it easy to squeeze the toothpaste without waste. The 2 magnetic mouthwash cups are designed with an upside-down drain, dust-proof and waterproof. You can hang 6 toothbrushes simultaneously, which is suitable for the whole family.

Easy to Install: No holes and no drill. Wall mounted installation does not hurt the wall. Just clean the wall and press the adhesive strip to bond the wall for 2 hours entirely, then you can hang the tooth brush holder.

Durable: Our toothbrush holders for bathrooms use a patented non-marking adhesive strip with an excellent caulking effect in humid environments, making it firmly bonded regardless of metal, wood, mirror, ceramic tile, or marble. If the wall is uneven, painted, or wallpaper, we have prepared nails for you to drill and reinforce the mounting. This adaptable design makes it a versatile solution for any home.

Easy to Use: There are holes at the bottom of the electric toothbrush holder to drain water stains and keep it ventilated and dry. The toothbrush organizer and the toothpaste dispenser can be disassembled, convenient for direct flushing with water. Suitable for all toothpaste with a hole diameter of 0.47 inches or less.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up
reviews.reviewText: I like the design and the way you do not have to plug it in a wall to get the toothpaste to come out of the tube. The spot you put the toothpaste in has a lever inside it that manually squeezes the tube. The extra shelf space Is nice too. The little drawer is a nice feature as well. Moreover, it holds up pretty good ,did not have to use nails to keep it attached to the wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well but have to screw it to the wall - not the sticky strip provided
reviews.reviewText: This is really cool and functional! Keeps everything nice and organized and my bathroom counter is no longer cluttered with everything. The toothpaste dispenser is SO helpful - just put the toothpaste tube in at the top and you press your toothbrush against the lever below and a perfect amount comes right out 😀It comes with a sticky strip to attach it to the wall but it didn’t stay put. Maybe it was due to the texture of my wall but I ended up using some anchors and screwing it directly into the wall.Definitely recommend this if you’re looking to organize your toiletries and such 👍👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Good Tootbrush Holder
reviews.reviewText: I really liked the feature that this toothbrush holder offered and even watched the video to make sure it is something that would work in our household. I also read and watched the reviews from those that already have and are using the item.The setup was fairly easy with the adhesive part being the hardest in the process (leave overnight to ensure it fastens to the wall). It can take a bit of time, also, when ensuring you are placing the adhesive (and the entire setup) so that the holder is leveled and not leaning right or left.One concern that a reviewer was actually kind enough to make a video out of was the "mess" the toothpaste dispenser creates. This part of the apparatus is quite narrow with the dispensing mechanism, the part that is pushed by the toothbrush to allow for the dispensing of the correct amount of toothpaste, located right in the middle of the hole. There is really no way to squeeze anything in there to be able to clean it unless using a cleaner the size of a q-tip. Additionally, q-tips are not meant to be used to clean small appliances since it is somewhat fragile and is not strong enough to scrub. I guess it can be cleaned if you remove it from the wall and run it through a sprayer. I thought I could create a workaround by wrapping the dispensing mechanism with plastic wrap, that way we can just remove the plastic when it requires replacement. However, this did not work as the holder is made of hard shiny plastic which the (plastic) wrap does not adhere to. We used the dispenser for about a week until we just gave up and stopped using it altogether.As is, the holder just became a better, more organized place to put our toothbrush and toothpaste on top of. The built and color (white) is nice but the functionality may need some redesigning so that cleaning can be easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Comes with 4 cups.. I have 3 kids so each kid has a cup & mom/dad share a cup. It holds up to *8* toothbrushes. It has 2 nice sized drawers for storage. I keep my rings & cotton rounds in one drawer, and toothpicks/teeth care in the other. It has a toothpaste dispenser.. i just don’t have any in it right now. I have before and it works as expected.I comes with 2 long sticky strips to stick on the back of the device to attach to the wall. I did try to stick it to our wall which is paint, and it fell a couple times. So I had to end up sticking it to the middle of our mirror which is fine with me. Its not in the way of being able to see ourselves because we have a double vanity. (It does say in the description that it won’t stick to painted walls so I did have a warning, I just wanted it on the wall at first). However!! I’ve only had to use one of the sticky strips even after it falling twice and reapplying it several times! If you had to or just wanted to use another method of hanging it like command strips I have seen other reviews that has worked for others. But the strips it comes with work really well!I have heavy weight on top of it (full bottle of mouth wash) plus other stuff and it has held up ever since I stuck it to the mirror… so as long as you listen to the description and stick it to the appropriate surface, it’s durable!The toothpaste dispenser isn’t the easiest to clean, but I think that’s with any dispenser. I just use a wet Q tip to clean up the left over toothpaste.Overall this purchase frees up counter space and looks nice. I love this storage solution!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ordered black. Great when you are trying to have a clear countertop or just more space in a small bathroom. Easy to adhere. For those renting, you don’t have to put holes in the wall to use. Can remove to clean. Cups are magnetized and don’t easily fall. Have to make sure that your toothpaste tubes have a screw top- not the smooth stand alone to use the toothpaste pump feature. Toothbrush hangs behind the cover. I ordered the black 2 cup version as it’s just me. Gurl, just order it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This could be better
reviews.reviewText: So the idea is there but the toothpaste area doesn’t work and the cups fall so many times it’s frustrating

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I only bought this because my sister had it at her house but anyways, this is so good and it keeps your bathroom counter, clean organize go buy yours today.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grand mother South in Carolina
reviews.reviewText: i just received the item and so far it has lived up to its name .The holding tape is very strong not like some i have had that only stay for a week or so. i also like the design of it very practical for every day uses. and it fits perfectly in my bathroom over my sink and leaves my counter top clear for other things . I really am glad i purchased 3 of them. i have not got the black oe yet but its on the way i am giving it to a Dear friend.
Muy bonito esteticamente, hasta ahora no ha resultado nada malo. Esta perfecto

reviews.reviewTitle: Lots of space , the kids love it
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It somehow makes it for fun for the kids to brush their teeth , they love the toothpaste dispenser so much and so do I, I was getting fed up with the mess and waste they made with the toothpaste . I like the black sleek and modern look , it's neat and keeps things organized. Now some toothpaste tube tip won't fit in the dispenser because they are to large , like the hello brand , so when shopping for toothpaste check if the one you use had a finger size tip , not a large one . I just want to mention that a sticked mine on a painted wall many months ago and the thing has never fallen down . The only thing I did was wash the wall with alcool then let it dry before applying it . Then I did not attach the holder on the adhesive until the next day to give it time to settle in .
Très esthétique dans ma salle de bain , fini le gaspillage de dentifrice avec les enfants et des rangements très pratiques , je suis ravie

Uns gefällt es sehr gut. Alles hat seinen Platz, ist staubgeschützt und ordentlich verstaut. Das Anbringen war einfach und der Zahnbürstenhalter hält gut. Wir benutzen keine Markenzahnpasta und sie passt problemlos rein und der Spender funktioniert sauber, ohne zu kleckern, auch für Ultraschallzahnbürsten mit kleinem Kopf. Man muss sie gerade halten, halt einmal ausprobieren. Wir sind zufrieden.
